encodingDesc.p: The original encoding was done in plain text files following the encoding quidelines of the Morgenländische Gesellschaft. With a dedicated web application these plain text files were transformed into XML documents validating (partially) against the Epidoc-Schema and those XML-Documents have been further sematically annotaded.
In order to avoid well known xml-issues especially in regards of overlapping elements the actual edited/annotated text was multiplied in several anonymos blocks, each block providing specific markup.

1.Ḥaram bin Thawbān has confessed and re- 2.pented to Dhū-Samāwī because he approached a 3.woman during her forbidden period and had coupled with a menstruating woman; 4.and because he entered a woman in childbed; and because he had en- 5.tered (the temple) in an impure state and had remained in his impure clothing; 6.and because he had had contact with a menstruating woman 7.and did not wash himself (afterwards); and because he had sullied 8.his clothing with semen. Thus he has abased 9.and humbled himself. And he will pay a monetary fine. And may he be requited (thereby).

Ḥaram bin Thawbān has confessed and re-
pented to Dhū-Samāwī because he approached a
woman during her forbidden period and had coupled with a menstruating woman;
and because he entered a woman in childbed; and because he had en-
tered the temple in an impure state and had remained in his impure clothing;
and because he had had contact with a menstruating woman
and did not wash himself afterwards; and because he had sullied
his clothing with semen. Thus he has abased
and humbled himself. And he will pay a monetary fine. And may he be requited thereby.
